name: Groovy Samples
tagline: some test groovy scripts as well as a few java samples
body:
groovysamples
=============

some test groovy scripts and a few java examples too

These samples mostly relate to various ways to archive folders and directories. Zip, tar, untar, bz2 style archives need to be covered here.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
